param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: CLASS SUFFIX
param.description: A SUFFIX TO BE APPLIED TO THE CSS CLASS OF THE MODULE

param.name: j_ad_format
param.label: AD LAYOUT
param.description: CHOOSE THE AD FORMAT AND SIZE THAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO DISPLAY ON YOUR PAGE

param.name: j_ad_type
param.label: Ad Type
param.description: CHOOSE THE AD TYPES YOU WOULD LIKE TO DISPLAY ON YOUR PAGE

param.name: j_ad_uifeatures
param.label: CORNER STYLES
param.description: OPTIONALLY, CHOOSE FROM ONE OF THE PRE-DESIGNED CORNER STYLES

param.name: j_color_border
param.label: BORDER COLOR
param.description: BORDER COLOR, IN HEX

param.name: j_color_link
param.label: LINK COLOR
param.description: LINK COLOR, IN HEX

param.name: j_color_bg
param.label: BACKGROUND COLOR
param.description: BACKGROUND COLOR, IN HEX

param.name: j_color_text
param.label: TEXT COLOR
param.description: TEXT COLOR, IN HEX

param.name: j_color_url
param.label: URL COLOR
param.description: URL COLOR, IN HEX

param.name: j_ad_css
param.label: DIV CSS CODES
param.description: INPUT ANY CSS CODE THAT YOU WANT HERE

param.name: j_ad_client
param.label: PUB-ID
param.description: PUB DES

param.name: j_ad_channel
param.label: CHANNEL
param.description: CHANNEL DES

param.name: j_alternate_ad_url
param.label: ALTERNATE AD URL
param.description: ALTERNATE AD URL TO SPECIFY OTHER ADS WHEN NO ADS ARE AVAILABLE

param.name: j_ip_block1
param.label: IP BLOCK 1
param.description: ENTER AN IP NUMBER HERE THAT YOU WISH TO BLOCK GOOGLE ADS FROM

param.label: IP BLOCK 2
param.description: ENTER AN IP NUMBER HERE THAT YOU WISH TO BLOCK GOOGLE ADS FROM

param.description: ENTER AN IP NUMBER HERE THAT YOU WISH TO BLOCK GOOGLE ADS FROM

param.description: ENTER AN IP NUMBER HERE THAT YOU WISH TO BLOCK GOOGLE ADS FROM

param.name: j_ip_block7
